attributes.title: How Cosmic Logic Relates To Binary Logic (WARNING: This Understanding Could Liberate You!)
attributes.description:
26 MAY 2020 

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*I WILL REVEAL THE SECRET TREASURES THROUGH THE SARVAJNANOTTARA AGAMA, PARAMASHIVA’S RESPONSE TO SUBRAHMANYA. 

*SUBRAMANYA ASKED SOME QUESTION TO PARAMASHIVA ABOUT THE NATURE OF PASHU AND PAASHA. HE NEVER QUESTIONS ABOUT THE PATI. HE ONLY, “ASKS HOW I CAN EXPERIENCE MORE PATI.” 

*YOU NEED TO KNOW THIS BEAUTIFUL VERSE:

*I WILL RECITE FROM SARVAJNANOTTARA AGAMA

पतिष्चा किं विधो ज्ञेयस्साधिकार पदे स्थितः  
शिवस्च  कीदृशः प्राक्ता योधिकार विवर्जितः 

PATISHCA KIM VIDHO JNEYASSAADHIKAARA PADE STHITAH 
SHIVASHCA KEEDRUSHAH PRAKTAA YODHIKAARA VIVARJITAH

“HOW THE ESSENTIAL NATURE OF PATI, WHO, BEING ESTABLISHED IN THE SPECIFIC STATE OF AUTHORITY, PERFORMS THE FIVEFOLD COSMIC FUNCTION, COULD BE KNOWN? HOW THE ESSENTIAL NATURE OF LORD SIVA WHO IS ABOVE AND FREE FROM THE SPECIFIC STATE OF AUTHORITY HAS BEEN EXPLAINED?”

*HE IS NOT QUESTIONING THE AUTHORITY OF PARAMASHIVA. HE IS ONLY ASKING HOW THE BINARY LOGIC AND COSMIC LOGIC IS MADE TO COEXIST TOGETHER. 

*YOU NEED TO UNDERSTAND HOW THE BINARY LOGIC YOU ARE EXPERIENCING AND THE MULTIDIMENSIONAL LOGIC OF THE COSMOS ARE HAPPENING...HOW THESE TWO ARE FITTING, LIKE HOW THE GEAR AND GEAR BOX GET CLUTCHED AND THE POWER IS TRANSMITTED AND HOW AND WHEN THEY GET UNCLUTCHED WHEN IT IS NOT NEEDED TO BE TRANSMITTED.

*HE IS ONLY ASKING ABOUT THE FUNCTIONALITY OF COSMIC LOGIC EMPOWERING BINARY LOGIC. HE IS NOT QUESTIONING THE AUTHORITY OF PATI. HE IS NOT DOUBTING THE POWERFUL EXISTENCE OF THE COSMIC LOGIC. HE IS ONLY ASKING, “HOW IS IT HAPPENING? EXPLAIN TO ME.”

*YOU NEED TO KNOW WHERE THE BINARY LOGIC UNDER WHICH YOU ARE ALL CAUGHT IS EMPOWERED BY COSMIC LOGIC, AND WHERE COSMIC LOGIC EMPOWERS BINARY LOGIC, WHERE COSMIC LOGIC KEEPS ITSELF AWAY FROM BINARY LOGIC, AND WHERE COSMIC LOGIC IS ABOVE THE PERCEPTION OF BINARY LOGIC.

*IT IS LIKE HOW COSMIC LOGIC CREATES BINARY LOGIC, WHERE IT SUSTAINS BINARY LOGIC, WHERE IT DESTROYS BINARY LOGIC, WHERE IT PUTS THE BINARY LOGIC INTO DELUSION AND WHERE IT LIFTS THE BINARY LOGIC AND LIBERATES IT! THAT'S IT!

*YOU ARE ALL SMALL SMALL SMALL WHEELS OF BINARY LOGIC. PARAMASHIVA IS THE LORD OF COSMIC LOGIC. THE COSMIC LOGIC GEAR TOUCHES YOUR WHEEL, AND EMPOWERS YOU, AWAKENS YOU, TRIGGERS YOU.

*WHEN YOU ARE EMPOWERED BY PARAMASHIVA AND YOU START GETTING DELUDED THAT IT IS BY YOUR OWN SUPERNAL EFFULGENCE, AND WHEN YOU REALISE THE POWER IS FROM COSMIC LOGIC NOT FROM INDIVIDUAL BINARY LOGIC AND REST BACK IN SAMADHI, THIS WHOLE FLOW IS SHIVA JNANA, IT IS THE PARAMASHIVA JNANA!

*ANYONE WHO UNDERSTANDS THIS WHOLE FLOW IS LIBERATED IMMEDIATELY! LIBERATION HAPPENS BY UNDERSTANDING OF THIS SIMPLE KNOWLEDGE. IT IS TOO SIMPLE, THAT IS THE MOST BEAUTIFUL THING! 

*THERE WILL BE A SHAFT THROUGH WHICH POWER IS TRANSMITTED INTO THE GEAR BOX. DIFFERENT GEARS ARE CONNECTED TO THE WHEEL WHICH MOVES THE VEHICLE. THOSE GEARS GET CONNECTED TO THE POWER GEAR. 

*SO UNDERSTAND, THE POWER GEAR IS THE COSMIC LOGIC - PARAMASHIVA - PARAMESHWARA. WHEN THAT GEAR IS ROTATING, EACH GEAR EMPOWERS THE WHEELS. 

*SOMETIMES ONLY FRONT TWO WHEELS ARE POWERED, SOMETIMES ALL FOUR ARE POWERED. THE GEARS COME AND GET CONNECTED TO THE POWER GEAR AND MOVE THE VEHICLE. 

*WHEN THE VEHICLE NEED NOT BE MOVED OR SPEED NEEDS TO BE CHANGED, THE GEAR THAT IS CONNECTED TO POWER GEAR MOVES OUT AND ANOTHER GEAR COMES AND GET CLUTCHED OR IF IT NEEDS TO STOP, THEN NO GEAR COMES AND THE WHOLE VEHICLE STOPS.

*THE SOURCE POWER GEAR IS PARAMASHIVA. THE INDIVIDUAL GEARS WHICH COME AND CONNECTED IS THE INDIVIDUAL SOUL, BINARY LOGIC, BOUND SELF, YOU. 

Read More At: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/3918278681593286
